```{r include=F}
grants_tb <- read.csv("../Data/Grants.csv")
```
```{r grants}
grants_tb %>% 
    dplyr::mutate(Funder_Amt = paste0(Funder," - ",Amount)) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = Role,
    when = Year,
    with = Title,
    where = Funder_Amt,
    .protect = TRUE)
```
